item.title:
In 1985, a company in Sucre, Bolivia stopped mining due to a weak sediment. Once eroded, it revealed a vertical wall covered in 70 million-year-old dinosaur footprints.
The world's largest dinosaur footprint park

item.title: If you ever need to back out what high-level packages you pip installed, don't pip freeze! That will include dependencies of your top-level packages, including a lot of system-specific packages that won't work elsewhere. Use `pipdeptree` instead. https://t.co/fpVTrJ4C0B
